title: Maria Pashi Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Maria Pashi? Check out all of Maria Pashi's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogMaria Pashi Data Specialist Maria Pashi Maria Pashi is a versatile professional who tells stories through data. With over 10 years of experience in the CPG industry, including roles at Unilever and Apple, she has helped companies shape their e-commerce strategies, enhance their digital presence, and prioritize data-driven decision-making. Leveraging her background in economics, Maria delivers insightful analytics on market trends and consumer behavior. When she’s not immersed in data, Maria can be found dancing under a disco ball, behind the decks, or exploring remote corners of the world.
